"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const onemap_1 = require("../../util/onemap");
const utils_1 = require("../../util/utils");
const package_1 = require("./package");
class PackageCollector {
    constructor(callback) {
        this.callback = callback;
        this.resolvePackage = new CollectingPackage();
        this.broadcastPackage = new CollectingPackage();
        this.channels = new onemap_1.OneMap(() => new CollectingPackage());
        this.timeout = null;
    }
    resolve(type, id, follow = []) {
        this.getCollector('resolve')
            .resolve
            .getOrCreate(type)
            .set(id, '');
        for (const f of follow)
            this.getCollector('resolve')
                .follow
                .getOrCreate(type)
                .set(f, '');
        this.setTimeout();
    }
    addObj(type, id, data) {
        this.getCollector('broadcast')
            .additive
            .getOrCreate(type)
            .set(id, data);
        this.setTimeout();
    }
    addField(type, id, field, data) {
        this.getCollector('broadcast')
            .additive
            .getOrCreate(type)
            .getOrCreate(id)
            .set(field, data);
        this.setTimeout();
    }
    deleteKey(type, id, field) {
        this.getCollector('broadcast')
            .substractive
            .getOrCreate(type)
            .getOrCreate(id)
            .set(field, '');
        this.setTimeout();
    }
    sendPackage(channel, packageType, receiver) {
        const channelCollector = this.channels.get(channel);
        if (channelCollector != null && !channelCollector.empty()) {
            this.callback(channelCollector.toPackage(), packageType, receiver);
            this.channels.delete(channel);
        }
    }
    requestIds(ids) {
        this.getCollector('resolve').requestIds += ids;
    }
    getCollector(pack) {
        if (pack === 'resolve')
            return this.resolvePackage;
        return this.broadcastPackage;
    }
    setTimeout() {
        if (this.timeout == null)
            this.timeout = setTimeout(() => {
                if (!this.resolvePackage.empty())
                    this.callback(this.resolvePackage.toPackage(), 'resolve');
                if (!this.broadcastPackage.empty())
                    this.callback(this.broadcastPackage.toPackage(), 'broadcast');
                this.resolvePackage = new CollectingPackage();
                this.broadcastPackage = new CollectingPackage();
            }, 0);
    }
}
exports.PackageCollector = PackageCollector;
function mapCreator() {
    return new Map();
}
function doubleMapCreator() {
    return new onemap_1.OneMap(mapCreator);
}
class CollectingPackage {
    constructor() {
        this.resolve = new onemap_1.OneMap(mapCreator);
        this.follow = new onemap_1.OneMap(mapCreator);
        this.additive = new onemap_1.OneMap(doubleMapCreator);
        this.substractive = new onemap_1.OneMap(doubleMapCreator);
        this.requestIds = 0;
    }
    toPackage() {
        const pack = new package_1.Package();
        pack.resolve = this.unmapResolveFollow(this.resolve);
        pack.follow = this.unmapResolveFollow(this.follow);
        pack.additive = this.unmapAdditive(this.additive);
        pack.substractive = this.unmapSubstractive(this.substractive);
        pack.requestIds = this.requestIds;
        return pack;
    }
    unmapResolveFollow(map2) {
        return onemap_1.unMap(map2, (map1) => onemap_1.flatten(map1, utils_1.ID));
    }
    unmapAdditive(map3) {
        return onemap_1.unMap(map3, (map2) => onemap_1.unMap(map2, (map1) => onemap_1.unMap(map1, utils_1.ID)));
    }
    unmapSubstractive(map3) {
        return onemap_1.unMap(map3, (map2) => onemap_1.unMap(map2, (map1) => onemap_1.flatten(map1, utils_1.ID)));
    }
    empty() {
        return this.resolve.size + this.additive.size + this.substractive.size === 0;
    }
}
